ygData.subject: Re: Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, the Enchanter is a Bard s best friend.  I have an Enchantress I group with whenever possible, with her Charms, MR reducing spells, and speed buffs we make
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, the Enchanter is a Bard's best friend. I have an Enchantress I group
with whenever possible, with her Charms, MR reducing spells, and speed buffs
we make a deadly team. Also Enchaters are one of the two classes that can
buff Charisma :) Plus she loves the Animal Cookies I bake her.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> Well, I was teamed with a level 16 Enchanter with a pet so maybe you
> would need a small party. We were very careful to only take on one
>at
> a time and did use the NPC camp for backup, but the exp. and the loot
> was great! Most of my suggestions assume at least a small party, I'm
> not much for soloing since Bards are ever so much more efficient with
> groups. I also tend to push my limits... I die on average of 2 or 3
> times a level. (can you say reckless? That guy in 'Lethal Weapon'
>is
> my hero... :) )
>
> BTW the Bard/Enchanter mini team rocks! You can take on MOB's that
> would normally reduce you to baking ingredients.
>
> Bujold 18th
> Xegony
